turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, do you have a special for large pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, you can buy two large pizzas for $16 dollars.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, that's the deal I want.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like pepperoni and cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like three cheese or mozzarella?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make that three cheese please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And would you our special stuffed crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What comes in it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It has a signature cheese stuffed inside a thick and crispy crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There is a $2 charge to upgrade to stuffed crust, is this ok

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, can I interest you in a two liter of mountain dew perhaps?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, do you have pepsi?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, we do have pepsi.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Give me two of those 2 liter pepsi's please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Very well, I have added 2, 2 liter pepsi's to your order. Would you like to try our new dessert pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What flavor is it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It is a cinnamon blend with white chocolate.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds too good to pass up. I'll take one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Excellent. I have added a dessert pizza to your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you tell me what my order is?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have two pizza's for $16 with pepperoni and three cheese with our stuffed crust, two 2 liters of pepsi and a dessert pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that sounds right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, the total is $29.99.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Are you sure that's correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have added the totals and applied your discount, sir.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, Ok. Just checking.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, your pizzas will arrive in 25 minutes. A receipt will be sent to your mobile device.

items.name: signature cheese stuffed inside a thick
